Constructor Detail

ControlParser

ControlParser(NodeParser np,
              RelationParser rp)
Builds the parser for callbacks based on the analysis of available nodes and the relations between those nodes (for mark infos).

Parameters:
np - analysis of nodes;
rp - analysis of relations.

                      org.w3c.dom.Element arg)

Parameters:
pot - A buffer set to accumulate potential values.
arg - The DOM element containing the description of potential values.

buildCallbacks

void buildCallbacks(org.w3c.dom.Element root)
Parses callback descriptions (nodes named "callback")

Parameters:
root - The "midlet" DOM element containing the descriptions.

getPurpose

private CallbackNode.Event getPurpose(java.lang.String method,
                                      java.lang.String template)
From a callback method name and the definition of the template class, it identifies the kind of events that are treated.

Parameters:
method - the callback method
template - the template class implemented by the class containing the callback
Returns:
Formal description of the event as an Event object.

buildActionMap

private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<ActionNode>> buildActionMap(java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> actions)
Builds ActionNode objects associated to a callback and a map linking NavStatic Ids to those objects.

Parameters:
actions - The list of DOM elements describing the actions.
Returns:
The association map to be used by buildPaths(CallbackNode, Map, List)

buildPaths

private void buildPaths(CallbackNode node,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<ActionNode>> actionMap,
                        java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> actions)
Build the paths of a callback

Parameters:
node - The callback node for which we are building the paths
actionMap - A map translating action ids in actual ActionNode.
actions - the list of DOM elements describing actions for this callback.
